instructions: Open Nimbuzz. Tap Register . Enter your mobile phone number, if prompted. Sign in with your Facebook account, or tap Skip to create a unique screen name and a password for Nimbuzz. You must confirm that you are at least 17 years old to create a Nimbuzz account. Allow Nimbuzz to access your contacts so that it can show you which friends are on the service. After signing in, chat with a chatbot to learn about the features of the service.
